mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, name, password, role, status, use_yn, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{role}, #{status}, #{userYn}, #{creatorId}, #{modifierId}, now(), now())
mapper.select: INSERT INTO user_history (user_id, sequence, name, password, role, status, use_yn, creator_id, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, (SELECT a.seq FROM (SELECT COUNT(user_id) + 1 AS seq FROM user_history WHERE user_id = #{id}) AS a), #{name}, #{password}, #{role}, #{status}, #{userYn}, #{modifierId}, (SELECT modified_at FROM user WHERE id = #{id}))
